HomePage.welcomeDescription: Your intelligent health companion, providing AI-powered insights and guidance for your well-being.
HomePage.startJourneyDescription: Begin with our AI Patient Interview to explore your symptoms and health concerns. MediMind AI will guide you through a series of questions to understand your situation better.
HomePage.aiConversationsDescription: Engage in a guided interview with our AI to discuss your symptoms and medical history.
HomePage.intelligentAnalysisDescription: Receive insights based on specialist knowledge and contextual recommendations tailored to you.
HomePage.securePrivateDescription: Your data is handled with the utmost care, ensuring privacy and security throughout the process.
HomePage.disclaimer: MediMind AI is intended for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare professional for any health concerns or before making any decisions related to your health or treatment.

AppLayout.footerRights: Â© {year} MediMind AI. All rights reserved. Data privacy ensured.
